00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : RelaxStats
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035

00051 
00052  SUBROUTINE RelaxStats
00053 
00054 ! Common Variables
00055  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00056  USE Domain
00057  USE FluidParams
00058  USE LBMParams, ONLY : Cs_sq, g
00059  USE MPIParams, ONLY : master, MPI_COMM_VGRID, vproc
00060  USE MPI
00061  IMPLICIT NONE
00062 
00063 !  Local Variables
00064  INTEGER :: i, j, k, ie, iw, jn, js, kt, kb
00065  INTEGER :: IO_ERR, MPI_ERR
00066  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: ux, uy, uz, phin, phin2, pressure, rhon, invRhon
00067  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradPhiX, gradPhiY, gradPhiZ, gradPhiSq, lapPhi
00068  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: in00, in01, in02, in03, in04, in05, in06, in07, in08, in09
00069  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: in10, in11, in12, in13, in14, in15, in16, in17, in18
00070  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: invVol, Pdif, Perr, Pin, Pout, R, Ro, Ref, Vef, Vol
00071  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:8) :: dataLocal, dataGlobal
00072 
00073 ! Initialize
00074  dataLocal(:)  = 0.D0
00075  dataGlobal(:) = 0.D0
00076  Ro = bubbles(1,4)
00077 
00078 ! Loop through all nodes inside the drop for the current processor, vproc
00079  DO k = zl, zu
00080    DO j = yl, yu
00081      DO i = xl, xu
00082 
00083        rhon    = SUM( g(i,j,k,:,now) )
00084        invRhon = 1.D0/rhon
00085        phin    = phi(i,j,k)
00086        phin2   = phin*phin
00087 
00088 ! Identify neighbours
00089        ie = ni(i,j,k,1)
00090        iw = ni(i,j,k,2)
00091        jn = ni(i,j,k,3)
00092        js = ni(i,j,k,4)
00093        kt = ni(i,j,k,5)
00094        kb = ni(i,j,k,6)
00095 
00096 ! Nodal values of the order parameter
00097        in00 = phi(i ,j ,k )
00098        in01 = phi(ie,j ,k )
00099        in02 = phi(iw,j ,k )
00100        in03 = phi(i ,jn,k )
00101        in04 = phi(i ,js,k )
00102        in05 = phi(i ,j ,kt)
00103        in06 = phi(i ,j ,kb)
00104        in07 = phi(ie,jn,k )
00105        in08 = phi(iw,js,k )
00106        in09 = phi(ie,js,k )
00107        in10 = phi(iw,jn,k )
00108        in11 = phi(ie,j ,kt)
00109        in12 = phi(iw,j ,kb)
00110        in13 = phi(ie,j ,kb)
00111        in14 = phi(iw,j ,kt)
00112        in15 = phi(i ,jn,kt)
00113        in16 = phi(i ,js,kb)
00114        in17 = phi(i ,jn,kb)
00115        in18 = phi(i ,js,kt)
00116 
00117 ! Laplacian of the order parameter
00118        lapPhi = ( in07 + in08 + in09 + in10 + in11 + in12 + in13 + in14 &
00119               + in15 + in16 + in17 + in18 + 2.0D0*( in01 + in02 + in03  &
00120               + in04 + in05 + in06 - 12.D0*in00 ) )*inv6
00121 
00122 ! Components of the order parameter gradient
00123        gradPhiX  = ( 2.0D0*( in01 - in02 ) + in07 - in08 + in09 - in10 &
00124                  + in11 - in12 + in13 - in14 )*inv12
00125 
00126        gradPhiY  = ( 2.0D0*( in03 - in04 ) + in07 - in08 + in10 - in09 &
00127                  + in15 - in16 + in17 - in18 )*inv12
00128 
00129        gradPhiZ  = ( 2.0D0*( in05 - in06 ) + in11 - in12 + in14 - in13 &
00130                   + in15 - in16 + in18 - in17 )*inv12
00131 
00132        gradPhiSq = gradPhiX*gradPhiX + gradPhiY*gradPhiY + gradPhiZ*gradPhiZ
00133 
00134 ! Calculate the pressure
00135        pressure = alpha*( phin2*( 3.D0*phin2 - 2.D0*phiStar2 ) - phiStar4 ) &
00136                 - kappa*( phin*lapPhi - 0.5D0*gradPhiSq ) + Cs_sq*rhon
00137 
00138 ! Calculate the velocity
00139        ux = ( g(i,j,k, 1,now) - g(i,j,k, 2,now) + g(i,j,k, 7,now) &
00140           -   g(i,j,k, 8,now) + g(i,j,k, 9,now) - g(i,j,k,10,now) &
00141           +   g(i,j,k,11,now) - g(i,j,k,12,now) + g(i,j,k,13,now) &
00142           -   g(i,j,k,14,now) )*invRhon
00143 
00144        uy = ( g(i,j,k, 3,now) - g(i,j,k, 4,now) + g(i,j,k, 7,now) &
00145           -   g(i,j,k, 8,now) - g(i,j,k, 9,now) + g(i,j,k,10,now) &
00146           +   g(i,j,k,15,now) - g(i,j,k,16,now) + g(i,j,k,17,now) &
00147           -   g(i,j,k,18,now) )*invRhon
00148 
00149        uz = ( g(i,j,k, 5,now) - g(i,j,k, 6,now) + g(i,j,k,11,now) &
00150           -   g(i,j,k,12,now) - g(i,j,k,13,now) + g(i,j,k,14,now) &
00151           +   g(i,j,k,15,now) - g(i,j,k,16,now) - g(i,j,k,17,now) &
00152           +   g(i,j,k,18,now) )*invRhon
00153 
00154 ! Calculate the accumulated quantities
00155        IF ( phi(i,j,k) >= 0.D0 ) THEN
00156          dataLocal(1) = dataLocal(1) + 1.D0
00157          dataLocal(2) = dataLocal(2) + ux
00158          dataLocal(3) = dataLocal(3) + uy
00159          dataLocal(4) = dataLocal(4) + uz
00160        END IF
00161 
00162        R =  DSQRT( ( DBLE(i) - bubbles(1,1) )**2 + ( DBLE(j) - bubbles(1,2) )**2 &
00163          + ( DBLE(k) - bubbles(1,3) )**2 )
00164 
00165        IF ( R < (Ro - IntWidth) ) THEN
00166          dataLocal(5) = dataLocal(5) + pressure
00167          dataLocal(6) = dataLocal(6) + 1.D0
00168        ELSE IF ( R > (Ro + IntWidth) ) THEN
00169          dataLocal(7) = dataLocal(7) + pressure
00170          dataLocal(8) = dataLocal(8) + 1.D0
00171        END IF
00172 
00173      END DO
00174    END DO
00175  END DO
00176 
00177 ! Gather global information
00178  CALL MPI_ALLREDUCE(dataLocal, dataGlobal, 8, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00179  Vol    = dataGlobal(1)
00180  invVol = 1.D0/Vol
00181 
00182  IF ( iStep == 0 ) invInitVol = invVol
00183 
00184 ! Define average velocity of the drop and effective radius and volume
00185  ux  = dataGlobal(2)*invVol
00186  uy  = dataGlobal(3)*invVol
00187  uz  = dataGlobal(4)*invVol
00188  Ref = ( Vol*invPi*0.75D0 )**(1.D0/3.D0)
00189  Vef = Vol*invInitVol
00190 
00191 ! Global value of the average pressure inside and outside the drop
00192  Pin  = dataGlobal(5)/dataGlobal(6)
00193  Pout = dataGlobal(7)/dataGlobal(8)
00194  Pdif = Pin - Pout
00195  Perr = 0.5D0*( 2.D0*sigma/Ro - Pdif )*Ro/sigma
00196 
00197 ! Analyze convergence - Done over a certain period of time ( 10 x tStats ) to
00198 ! ensure that long range fluctuations do not give false positives
00199  Convergence(tCall) = Pdif
00200  IF ( MOD(tCall,11) == 0 ) THEN
00201    eps   = 0.D0
00202    tCall = 1
00203    DO i = 2, 11
00204      eps = eps + DABS( Convergence(i) - Convergence(i-1) )
00205    END DO
00206    eps = eps*0.1D0/Pdif
00207  ELSE
00208    tCall = tCall + 1
00209  END IF
00210 
00211 ! Save velocity and effective radius and volume data from the master node only
00212  IF( vproc == master ) THEN
00213    OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "relax_stats.out", STATUS = "UNKNOWN", &
00214         POSITION = "APPEND", IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00215    IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00216      WRITE(10,'(I9,7ES19.9)')iStep,ux,uy,uz,Vef,Ref,Pdif,Perr
00217      CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00218    ELSE
00219      CALL MemAlloc(2)
00220      CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00221      STOP "Error: Unable to open output file 'relax_stats.out'."
00222    END IF
00223  END IF
00224 
00225  RETURN
00226  END SUBROUTINE RelaxStats
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:46 2008 for ZSC-3D-STD-MPI by  1.5.6
